Attrs.Lyrics:
Oh, you can’t find love
Hiding in the shadows
Never walking in the water
You can’t find love
You can’t find love

Oh you just can’t win
Waiting for tomorrow
Never walking in the water
You just can’t win
And you can’t find love
You can’t find love

Oh, you can’t find love
Hiding in the shadows
Never walking in the water
You can’t find love
You can’t find love
Attrs.Recording:
Revenge of the Budgie (Takoma, TAK 7106, 1983)
Chilly Winds (Folk Era/Homecoming, 1401, 1993)
